Type.Name: XmlParserContext
Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Provides all the context information required by instances of the class to parse an XML fragment.

MemberSignature.Value: .property string BaseURI { public hidebysig specialname instance string get_BaseURI() public hidebysig specialname instance void set_BaseURI(string value) }
public string BaseURI { set; get; }

summary.para: Gets or sets the base URI.

value.para: A specifying the base URI to use for resolving the DTD file.

remarks.para: If an attempt is made to set this property to , it is set to .

block.para: A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore can contain nodes that come from different places. The property shows where these nodes originated.

summary.para: Gets or sets the name of the document type in a document type declaration.

remarks.para: If an attempt is made to set this property to , it is set to .

block.para: A document type declaration is of the following form:
This property, along with , , and properties, provide all the document type declaration information.

MemberSignature.Value: .property string XmlLang { public hidebysig specialname instance string get_XmlLang() public hidebysig specialname instance void set_XmlLang(string value) }
public string XmlLang { set; get; }

summary.para: Gets or sets the current xml:lang scope.

value.para: A specifying the current xml:lang scope. If there is no xml:lang in scope, is returned.

remarks.para: If an attempt is made to set this property to , it is set to .

block.para: The language attribute, xml:lang, specifies the language in which the content and attribute values of the current element are written.
For details on valid xml:lang values, refer to section 2.12 of the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation.

MemberSignature.Value: .property valuetype System.Xml.XmlSpace XmlSpace { public hidebysig specialname instance valuetype System.Xml.XmlSpace get_XmlSpace() public hidebysig specialname instance void set_XmlSpace(valuetype System.Xml.XmlSpace value) }
public System.Xml.XmlSpace XmlSpace { set; get; }

summary.para: Gets or sets the current xml:space scope.

value.para: One of the members of the enumeration indicating the xml:space scope.

block.para: The white space attribute, xml:space, specifies how white space is handled in the current element.
